title: Campaign Context
description: Marketing campaign attribution data, typically derived from UTM parameters and ad platform click identifiers.

source.description: The traffic source (utm_source), e.g. google, newsletter, facebook.

medium.description: The marketing medium (utm_medium), e.g. cpc, email, social, organic.

name.description: The campaign name (utm_campaign), e.g. spring_sale, product_launch.

content.description: The ad content variant (utm_content), used for A/B testing or differentiating ads.

id.description: A unique identifier for the campaign.

clickId.description: The click identifier from an ad platform (e.g. gclid, fbclid, msclkid).

clickIdType.description: The type of click identifier, indicating which ad platform generated it.
